channel.title: How to make a npc trade?
channel.description: hey guys i want to know how to make a npc trade like if you spawn one, right click trade, then the trade screen shows up. when i spawn this npc id 1596 i select trade and talk and it wont work? is there a way to make him able to trade? i set him as my pk point shop. the npc id before that was 522 i just changed the id to 1596

item.title: How to make a npc trade?
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

Go to your npc file, where you spawn all npcâ€™s, and add a new code with the id: 1596
then go to your npc definition file, and add npc definitions. But first search for the id: 1596, if you not find it, then add a new code.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc trade?
